# IServiceProviderBuilder.Build method

Builds the service provider, finalizing the service registrations and creating an [`IServiceProvider`](../IServiceProvider.md) instance.

```csharp
public IServiceProvider Build()
```

## Return Value

An [`IServiceProvider`](../IServiceProvider.md) instance with the configured services.
